data.text:
This article is about a film in Avataro Sentai Donbrothers.

Avataro Sentai Donbrothers The Movie: New First Love Hero (æš´å¤ªéƒæˆ¦éšŠãƒ‰ãƒ³ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚º THE MOVIE æ–°ãƒ»åˆæ‹ãƒ’ãƒ¼ãƒ­ãƒ¼, AbatarÅ Sentai DonburazÄzu Za MÅ«bÄ«: Shin Hatsukoi HÄ«rÅ)[2] is a Japanese superhero film that serves as the summer movie adaptation of Avataro Sentai Donbrothers, double-billed with Kamen Rider Revice: Battle Familia.

Synopsis[]

to be added

Plot[]

The movie opens with Haruka in a white dress walking up the stairs to an awards ceremony with the paparazzi surrounding her. She narrates that she was born to be an actress as she goes to the podium to accept her award as best new actress. Haruka is interviewed by the press as the first young actress to win the award in their first movie. Haruka narrates that she went from manga artist to hero to an actress.

As for how all this happenedâ€¦..

A flashback reveals that Sononi is playing a high school girl with Sonoi playing another student, they do a scene together but the director Kuroiwa cuts because their acting is too perfect to the point that it comes off as unrealistic. Producer Saegusa is frustrated because of the directorâ€™s obsession for realism but decides to scout for new lead actors, Sonoi pleads for another chance as both he and Sononi are willing to take on any role she asks for in the film.

Sonoza is observing this from Ideon and believes that they are disgracing the Noto by taking part in a human made movie. Sonoi defends his decision by stating film is a form of art and by understanding art, he can understand humanity. Sononi finds being an actress interesting and tries to encourage Sonoza to join them, but the monitor picks up a Hitotsuki racing around town and he declines the offer to go hunting.

The Hurricaneger Hitotsuki, Ninpuki, terrorizes innocent people inside a building and then uses Super Ninja Art: Shadow Dance to quickly absorb them into his body when they run outside.

The Donbrothers arrive, with Tsubasa waking from a nap and Tsuyoshi in an awkward pose because he was on a train when he was teleported. NinpÅ«ki materializes Anoni to fight the team while he engages Taro one on one, with Tsubasa riding on Tsuyoshiâ€™s back to do aerial shots on their opponents. Sonoza arrives armored up and interrupts Taro while Ninpuki tries to slip away, Taro uses the ZanglaSword to execute the Decisive Peach Slash to push away Sonoza as Ninpuki escapes while the others have finished destroying the Anoni.

Continuity and Placement[]

This movie takes place after the events of episode 20, which features a short scene tying into the movie's events.

Promotional CM[]

In episodes 6-8 of Don-chan, the Donbrothers cast members made a promotional CM for this movie.[4] In episode 6, they held an audition to select the actors appearing in the CM. In episode 7, Hirofumi Suzuki wrote the script with Shinnosuke Takahashi. In episode 7 and 8, the cast filmed the CM. Each of the Donbrothers cast members had different roles in the production of the CM. The CM didn't contain any footage from the movie. The completed CM was released on Super Hero Time's official YouTube channel, which is only available for viewing in Japan.[5]

Errors[]

Notes[]

Count at movie end

Gears in the Donbrothers' possession: Zenkaiger, Ryusoulger, ToQger, Lupinranger, Ohranger, Patranger, Zyuohger, Fiveman, Kiramager, Go-Busters, Gokaiger, Ninninger, Kyuranger, Kyoryuger, Turboranger, Carranger, Zyuranger, Jetman, Go-Onger, Dairanger, Hurricaneger

The movie's title is a reference to New First Love Hero, a doujinshi manga that was created by Naoki Shiina who was the creator of Broken Heart Night, a manga that the public had claimed that Haruka Kitou had plagiarized from in order to create her doujinshi manga, First Love Hero.

The movie's events are acknowledged in episode 36 where Haruka explains it to Natsumi Kuramochi.

The date shown on the calendar in CafÃ© Donbura when the Donbrothers discussing about their casting is Wednesday, July 20.

The date shown on the package delivered by Taro to a customer is July 22, the same as the movie's premiere date.
